action.sure: Are you sure you want to confirm this action?

login.name: Ingame-name
login.forgot_password_description: If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it by using the /account command in-game.

files.file_renamed: The file has been renamed successfully.
files.delete_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item.
files.no_results: No files found matching your search.

empty.title: This folder is empty
empty.description: Upload files or create a new folder to get started.

create_folder.title: Create new folder
create_folder.feedback: The folder has been created successfully.

backup.title: Backups
backup.subtitle: Create and restore backups of your server
backup.name: Backup
backup.description: What do you want to backup?
backup.restore_text: MCDash will restore this backup while runtime. Since Minecraft automatically saves the worlds every few seconds from memory, your world might get corrupted. To prevent this, you can stop the server without saving the world from memory. Any unsaved changes made to the server while runtime will be lost. This does not apply if you want to restore logs or other files that are not getting automatically saved by Minecraft.

delete.title: Delete backup
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?

status.title: Server Status
status.description: Control the main SSH server status

properties.warning: Changing these settings can have a significant impact on your server. Please proceed with caution.
properties.updated_description: Restart your server to apply the changes.
properties.enable-jmx-monitoring: Enable JMX monitoring for server metrics and performance data
properties.level-seed: Seed for world generation. Leave empty for random seed
properties.enable-command-block: Enables command blocks in the game
properties.gamemode: Default game mode for new players
properties.generator-settings: Custom world generation settings in JSON format
properties.enforce-secure-profile: Enforces secure profiles for player authentication
properties.level-name: The name of the world directory
properties.motd: Message of the day shown in the server list
properties.query.port: Port for GameSpy4 protocol server queries
properties.generate-structures: Generate villages, dungeons, and other structures in new worlds
properties.max-players: Maximum number of players allowed on the server
properties.online-mode: Requires player authentication with Minecraft account
properties.allow-flight: Allows players to use flight in survival mode
properties.view-distance: Number of chunks sent to players for rendering
properties.enable-rcon: Enables remote console access to the server
properties.ressource-pack: URL to a custom resource pack
properties.simulation-distance: Distance at which game mechanics are processed
properties.player-idle-timeout: Time in minutes before idle players are kicked (0 to disable)
properties.force-gamemode: Force players to join in the default gamemode
properties.hardcore: If true, players will be set to spectator mode if they die
properties.white-list: Enables a white list on the server
properties.spawn-npcs: Allows villagers and other NPCs to spawn
properties.use-native-transport: Use native transport optimization if available
properties.broadcast-console-to-ops: Broadcast console command output to all online operators
properties.pause-when-empty-seconds: Time in seconds before server saves and halts when no players are online
properties.broadcast-rcon-to-ops: Broadcast Remote Console (RCON) to all online operators
properties.allow-nether: Allows players to travel to the Nether
properties.max-chained-neighbor-updates: Maximum number of chunk updates that can be chained at once
properties.max-tick-time: Maximum single tick time in milliseconds
properties.initial-disabled-packs: List of resource packs that are disabled by default
properties.resource-pack-sha1: SHA-1 hash of the resource pack
properties.spawn-protection: Distance in blocks around the spawn point that non-ops are prevented from building
properties.resource-pack: URL to a custom resource pack
properties.require-resource-pack: Force players to use the resource pack
properties.resource-pack-prompt: Text sent to clients when they are prompted to download a resource pack
properties.server-ip: IP address for server to listen on
properties.hide-online-players: Hides the number of online players in the server list
